name: In the Name of the World

passive.name: Inheritor
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, and ATK increases by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong>.
